name: E. Distance Learning Courses in MAC
statement:
The New Year has arrived in the Master’s Assistance Center, which means
it’s time to introduce a new feature!Now students are given distance
learning courses, with a total of n courses available. For the i-th
distance learning course, a student can receive a grade ranging from x_i
to y_i.However, not all courses may be available to each student.
Specifically, the j-th student is only given courses with numbers from
l_j to r_j, meaning the distance learning courses with numbers l_j,
l_j + 1,
ldots, r_j.The creators of the distance learning courses have decided to
determine the final grade in a special way. Let the j-th student receive
grades c_{l_j}, c_{l_j + 1},
ldots, c_{r_j} for their distance learning courses. Then their final
grade will be equal to c_{l_j} | c_{l_j + 1} |
ldots | c_{r_j}, where | denotes the bitwise OR operation.Since the
chatbot for solving distance learning courses is broken, the students
have asked for your help. For each of the q students, tell them the
maximum final grade they can achieve.
